properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed for handling the Real sort
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((r Real)) (= (u2r (r2u r)) r))) (assert (forall ((x U)) (! (=> (= (typeof x) sort_real) (= (r2u (u2r x)) x)) :pattern ((typeof x))))) (assert (forall ((x U)) (! (=> (instanceof x sort_real) (= (typeof x ) sort_real)) :pattern ((instanceof x sort_real))))) (assert (forall ((r Real)) (! (= (typeof (r2u r)) sort_real) :pattern ((typeof (r2u r))))))
(declare-fun u2r (U) Real) (declare-fun r2u (Real) U) (declare-const sort_real T)
